action.action-desc: Ms. Stabenow introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to facilitate increased coordination and alignment between the public and private sector with respect to quality and efficiency measures.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Quality Measure Alignment Act of 2015.

section.header: Facilitation of increased coordination and alignment between the public and private sector with respect to quality and efficiency measures

subsection.text: Section 1890(b) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395aaa(b)) is amended by inserting after paragraph (3) the following new paragraph:

paragraph.header: Facilitation of increased coordination and alignment between the public and private sector with respect to quality and efficiency measures

subparagraph.text: The entity shall facilitate increased coordination and alignment between the public and private sector with respect to quality and efficiency measures.

The entity shall prepare and make available to the public annual reports on its findings under this paragraph. Such public availability shall include posting each report on the Internet website of the entity.

subsection.text: The amendment made by subsection (a) shall take effect on the date of the enactment of this Act.
